params.unclaimedState: Unclaimed state that is being claimed

execute(uint8,bytes[],address,bool,addre.details: Implementations should not send tokens to `wallet` directly and use `EmailWalletCore.depositTokenToAccount()` insteadDecode {tokenAmount} in template as `abi.decode(uint256,string)` (`tokenName` and `tokenAmount`)

params.hasEmailRecipient: Whether the email subject has a recipient (email address)
params.recipientETHAddr: The ETH address of the recipient in email (if any, and hasEmailRecipient = false)
params.subjectParams: Array of params decoded from email subject based on the template, in the same order matchers
params.templateIndex: Index of the subjectTemplate to which the subject was matched

params.isInternal: A flag whether the unclaimed state is registered from `registerUnclaimedStateAsExtension` and the caller and callee extensions are the same.

claimUnclaimedState((uint256,bytes32,add.notice: Claim an unclaimed state to recipient user

registerUnclaimedState((uint256,bytes32,.notice: Register unclaimed state for a recipient emailCommitment

documentation.text:
Revert an expired inclaimed state
 @param unclaimedState Unclaimed state that is expired
